  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207154</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Rise and Fall of Jim Crow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anstieg und Fall der Jim Krähe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Élévation et automne de corneille de Jim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ascensão e queda do corvo de Jim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aumento e caduta del corvo di Jim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανοδος και πτώση jim Crow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Subida y caída del cuervo de Jim</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">looks at the century of segregation following the Civil War (1863-1954). Jim Crow, a name taken from a popular 19th-century minstrel song, came to personify government-sanctioned racial oppression and segregation in the U.S. This website describes pivotal developments during that time?the Emancipation Proclamation, the Compromise of 1877, the Brown v. Board of Education decision, and others.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blicke auf das Jahrhundert der Abtrennung dem 
Bürgerkrieg (1863-1954) folgend. Jim Krähe, ein Name, der von 
einem populären Lied des Minnesängers 19th-century genommen wurde, 
kam, Regierung-sanktionierte rassische Unterdrückung und Abtrennung 
in den US zu verkörpern. Diese Web site beschreibt 
Angelentwicklungen während dieser time?the Emanzipation-Proklamation,
des Kompromisses von 1877, des braunen v. Brettes der Ausbildung 
Entscheidung und anderer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">regards au siècle de la ségrégation suivant la 
guerre civile (1863-1954). La corneille de Jim, un nom pris 
d'une chanson populaire du troubadour 19th-century, est venue pour 
personnifier l'oppression et la ségrégation raciales 
gouvernement-sanctionnées aux États-Unis. Ce site Web décrit 
des développements pivotaux pendant cette proclamation 
d'émancipation de time?the, le compromis de 1877, le conseil brun de 
v. de la décision d'éducation, et d'autres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">olhares no século do segregation que segue a 
guerra civil (1863-1954). O corvo de Jim, um nome feito exame de
uma canção popular do minstrel 19th-century, veio personificar o 
oppression e o segregation raciais governo-government-sanctioned nos 
E. U.. Este Web site descreve desenvolvimentos pivotal durante 
esse proclamation do emancipation do time?the, o acordo de 1877, a 
placa marrom do v. da decisão da instrução, e outra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sguardi al secolo della segregazione che segue la 
guerra civile (1863-1954). Il corvo di Jim, un nome preso da una
canzone popolare del minstrel 19th-century, è venuto personificare il
oppression e la segregazione razziali governo-government-sanctioned 
negli Stati Uniti. Questo Web site descrive gli sviluppi chiave 
durante quella proclamazione di emancipazione del time?the, il 
compromesso di 1877, il Bordo marrone del v. della decisione di 
formazione e gli altri.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει τον αιώνα του διαχωρισμού μετά από τον 
εμφύλιο πόλεμο (1863-1954). Jim Crow, ένα όνομα 
που λήφθηκε από ένα δημοφιλές τραγούδι τροβαδούρων 19$ος-αιώνα,
ήρθε να προσωποποιήσει την κυβέρνηση-εγκριμένους φυλετικούς 
κατοχή και το διαχωρισμό στις ΗΠΑ Αυτός ο ιστοχώρος 
περιγράφει τις κεντρικές εξελίξεις κατά τη διάρκεια εκείνης της 
time?the προκήρυξης Χειραφέτησης, του συμβιβασμού 1877, 
Brown V. Board της απόφασης εκπαίδευσης, και άλλων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">miradas en el siglo de la segregación que sigue 
la guerra civil (1863-1954). El cuervo de Jim, un nombre tomado 
de una canción popular del minstrel 19th-century, vino personificar 
la opresión y la segregación raciales gobierno-sancionadas en los 
E.E.U.U.. Este Web site describe progresos giratorios durante 
esa proclamación de la emancipación del time?the, el compromiso de 
1877, la tarjeta marrón del v. de la decisión de la educación, y 
otras.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

        </educational>

            <value>yes</value>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
